author: James Joyce
text: Dear Larbaud: Have just got back here and hope we meet soon. Is this a good Spanish publisher? Please return it (the letter) and let me know if you approve. What about Gilbert’s chapter of his Ulysses book for the Revue de France. I suppose you got the Fortnightly. Have arranged for the English translation of Les Lauriers sont Coupés with a preface by George Moore. Kindest regards to both J.J.
